title: Chatelaine, "Gold and steel watch chain", 19th century
description: From a swivel hook hang two link-chains which are attached to an octagonal gold plate from which hang four ornaments (two tassels, a watch key and a case containing a hook).  The links are formed of oval bands of gold surrounfing steel beads.  The plate and ornaments are of gold, decorated with steel beads.

exhibitions.title: Body Language: Jewelry and Accessories from the National Design Museum
